head.supplied: ¶ I h. the h. to ack. the rec. of yr. letter of 28 May enquiring what price Mr Bruce ¶ asks for the large Cranbourne Meteorite and in reply I beg to state that I have always been under the impressio...

div.p: From Frederick McCoy to Robert Brough Smyth
Outward letter book 2, no. 62/98, Museum of Victoria, Melbourne.

I h. the h. to ack. the rec. of yr. letter of 28 May enquiring what price Mr Bruce
James Bruce.
asks for the large Cranbourne Meteorite and in reply I beg to state that I have always been under the impression that Mr Bruce wd not sell it but intended to present half of it to the Brit. Mus. and half to the Nat Mus of this Colony.

I was in hopes that as Mr Abel had sent home the somewhat smaller Cranbourne Meteorite for sale to the Brit Mus. Mr Bruce might have been inclined to leave the whole of the 2nd one for this colony but Dr Muellers exertions in the opposite direction threw additional difficulties I fear in the way and I at present see nothing better than His Ex. suggestion under the circumstances of letting the Brit Mus. buy the smaller one and send it out to this mus. receiving the larger one in Exchange.
